integration.http-endpoint-url-copied-message: HTTP endpoint URL has been copied to clipboard
integration.port-range: Port should be in a range from 1 to 65535.
integration.connect-timeout-range: Connection timeout should be in a range from 1 to 200.
integration.client-id-range: Client ID should be in a range from 1 to 23 characters. [MQTT-3.1.3-5]
integration.client-id-pattern: Client ID should consist of numbers, upper and lower case letters. [MQTT-3.1.3-5]
integration.drop-file: Drop a file or click to select a file to upload.
integration.service-bus-namespace-name-required: Service Bus Namespace Name is required.
integration.kinesis-use-credentials-from-instance-me: Use credentials from the Amazon EC2 Instance Metadata Service
integration.kinesis-application-name: Application name (by default equals Stream name)
integration.integration-key-copied-message: Integration key has been copied to clipboard
integration.integration-secret-copied-message: Integration secret has been copied to clipboard
integration.so-broadcast: Enable broadcast - integration will accepts broadcast address packets
integration.so-keepalive-option: Enable sending of keep-alive messages on connection-oriented sockets
integration.so-reuse-addr: Bind the process to a port
integration.tcp-no-delay: Forces a socket to send the data without buffering (disable Nagle's buffering algorithm)
integration.fail-fast: Thrown exception soon as the decoder notices the length of the frame will exceed max size
integration.length-field-offset-range: Length Field Offset should be in a range from 0 to 8.
integration.length-field-length-range: Length Field Length should be in a range from 0 to 8.
integration.length-adjustment: Length Adjustment (the compensation value to add to the value of the length field)
integration.length-adjustment-range: Length Adjustment should be in a range from 0 to 8.
integration.byte-order: Byte Order of the length field
integration.initial-bytes-to-strip: Number of first bytes to strip out from the decoded frame
integration.initial-bytes-to-strip-required: Number of first bytes to strip out from the decoded frame is required.
integration.initial-bytes-to-strip-range: Number of first bytes to strip out from the decoded frame should be in a range from 0 to 8.
integration.so-backlog-option: Max number of pending connects on the socket
integration.so-backlog-option-required: The max number of pending connects on the socket is required.
integration.so-backlog-option-range: The max number of pending connects on the socket should be in a range from 1 to 65535.
integration.so-rcv-buf: Size of the buffer for inbound socket (in KB)
integration.so-rcv-buf-required: Size of the buffer for inbound socket (in KB) is required.
integration.so-rcv-buf-range: Size of the buffer for inbound socket (in KB) should be in a range from 1 to 65535.
integration.so-snd-buf: Size of the buffer for outbound socket (in KB)
integration.so-snd-buf-required: Size of the buffer for outbound socket (in KB) is required.
integration.so-snd-buf-range: Size of the buffer for outbound socket (in KB) should be in a range from 1 to 65535.
integration.max-frame-length-required: Max Frame Length (in bytes) is required.
integration.max-frame-length-range: Max Frame Length (in bytes) should be in a range from 1 to 65535.
